data.question: How do I join a study group?
data.answer: To join a study group, navigate to the Groups section in the app, explore available groups, and click on Join Group for the group you're interested in.
data.title: Signals and Systems

data.question: Can I create my own study group?
data.answer: Yes, you can create your own study group! Click on Create New Group in the Groups section, fill out the details, and become the group administrator.
data.title: Mechatronics Virtual Lab

data.question: How do I earn badges and points in the app?
data.answer: Badges and points are earned through various achievements such as completing assignments, performing well in exams, and actively participating in study groups. Explore the Gamification Hub to track your progress.
data.title: Mechanics of Machines

data.question: Is there a notification system in the app?
data.answer: Yes, the app provides real-time notifications. You'll be notified about new group invitations, achievements, shared resources, and other important updates.
data.title: Smart Glass Engineers

data.question: How do I earn badges and points here?
data.answer: Badges and points are earned through various achievements such as completing assignments, performing well in exams, and actively participating in study groups. Explore the Gamification Hub to track your progress.
data.title: Akin

data.question: Can I communicate with other group members?
data.answer: Yes, you can! Engage in discussions by posting messages, questions, or announcements in the group's discussion board. Reply to posts and actively participate in group conversations.
data.title: Debo

data.question: Report a problem in the map
data.answer: We’re always looking for ways to improve the accuracy of our maps. If you’ve identified a map error, please report it by adding the details below.
data.title: Daniel
